summary_and_description:
Inconsistent window control states in save/download dialog

Issue:
The save/download dialog exhibits contradictory window control behavior:
- Maximize button is visually disabled (correct)
- Right-click title bar menu incorrectly shows enabled Maximize/Size options
- Selecting these options causes abnormal dialog behavior

Technical Analysis:
Root cause traced to window style flags:
- Spy++ reveals DS_MODALFRAME (0x00000080) flag set
- Verified via test application: Removing DS_MODALFRAME fixes menu behavior
- Likely originates from XP Toolkit/Widgets layer

Reproduction Steps:
1. Open any save/download dialog
2. Right-click title bar
3. Observe enabled (but non-functional) Maximize/Size options
4. Select either option to see UI corruption

Impact:
While not functionally critical, this creates:
- UI inconsistency (disabled button vs enabled menu)
- Potential for minor dialog corruption
